text:
MongoDB | Senior Software Engineer | NYC | Onsite | 150-200K + equity

We are looking for an exceptional Software Engineer that can help us build new features on our Cloud Manager application. This role has a focus on server side development (core java) as well running a large deployment (AWS). We also use (Go) for software installed on our client servers, but we can teach you that on the job if you have never used it before.

Please send your resume to thomas.cirri@mongodb.com or apply directly at http://grnh.se/u7fsqt1
